title: Interpretation of a dream about a butterfly: Seeing butterflies floating in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a butterfly in a dream for a single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, or divorced woman, whether it is black, white, colored, killers, flies, hunting, Ibn Sirin, or other. Seeing a butterfly in a dream The butterfly is considered one of the most brilliant insects. There are many beautiful species that differ in their colors and shapes. Many of us love to see butterflies and are happy when they see them flying beside them. If you dream of a butterfly, the dream can indicate many signs, including a new change in your life environment. And if you see the butterfly among the flowers in the garden, it means that you will get beautiful profits in your life. If a girl dreams of a colorful butterfly, this means that she will be connected to a very strong love story. A butterfly in a dream may represent an increase in social relationships in the dreamer’s life. This may indicate his need to go out and get away to get rid of the worries and problems he is going through. Thus, butterflies in general are a symbol of transformation, because they transform from a caterpillar into a butterfly. It is one of the deepest natural wonders. * Therefore, many believe that it indicates a change in the dreamer’s life. If you see butterflies floating, this means that news will come to you from absent friends with a message or a meeting with a person. A butterfly can mean that you need stability in your life and focus on the most important things. If you see a dead butterfly, this means that your goals in life are unclear. Interpretation of a butterfly in a dream by Ibn Sirin Butterflies are considered among the most beautiful creatures that people see in life, as they are distinguished by their beautiful and cheerful colors. Seeing butterflies in a dream foretells good and happy news that will befall the viewer in the coming period. Interpretation of a butterfly in one dream. Seeing a butterfly in an unmarried girl’s dream is an indication of the good news that the unmarried woman will hear in the coming days, especially if the color of the butterfly is white or green. Flowers. Seeing butterflies standing on the forehead of an unmarried girl in a dream indicates good luck, and the butterfly flying around the unmarried girl indicates hope that will be renewed again in her life. Interpretation of the butterfly in a married woman’s dream. As for the married woman who sees butterflies in her dream, this is an indication On the upcoming joy in her life, and the colored butterfly on her married hand is an indication of the fulfillment of a wish or desire that she loves. The butterfly that stands on the husband’s face or head in a married woman’s dream is an indication of her benefit or goodness to her husband, and it may be money or work. In general, a butterfly in a married woman’s dream is a sign of success, especially if the color of the butterfly is white, pink, or green. Interpretation of a butterfly in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe interpretation of seeing butterflies in a pregnant woman’s dream does not differ from the interpretation of a married woman, except that a pregnant woman’s dream of a butterfly landing on her Her bed is a sign of imminent labor and delivery. Seeing a colorful butterfly in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a baby girl, while a single-colored butterfly indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair loss in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair loss in a dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing hair loss in a dream in detail, hair loss is one of the most common problems that all women suffer from and disturb their lives. The issue is not the same, here it is not a problem that needs treatment, but rather it is a sign of something or a meaning of something or a certain result, so we present to you through this article We will discuss in detail the interpretation of a dream about hair loss in a dream, based on the great Arab interpreters and scholars. You are likely to see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a trimmed beard Interpretation of a dream about hair loss by Ibn Sirin If the fortune teller picks up his falling hair, this indicates that he will fulfill his promises to someone. If the falling hair is curly, this means that the seer will receive compensation. Hair loss of the trunk and armpit indicates the repayment of debts. The density of falling hair means joy and happiness. The appearance of black hair for a married woman, indicating her husband's love for her. Hair loss may indicate a good opportunity that came to the fortune teller, but he did not take advantage of it and regretted it. If the fortune teller is hairless, this means that he is anxious and sad. The seer who pulls his hair indicates a loss of money. Hair loss is considered Unnecessary is a sign of anxiety and worry. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for unmarried women If an unmarried woman sees a lock of her hair falling out, this indicates the arrival of goodness and happiness for her and the death of worry and sadness. If he wants to get married, he will succeed, and if he wants to travel, he will succeed. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that a lock of her hair has fallen out, this indicates a happy event, most likely an imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream a lock of her hair falling out, this means that she will relieve her distress, correct her condition and facilitate her birth. If a pregnant woman sees a white lock of her hair falling out, this is evidence that the newborn is a male. That the newborn is female. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for a man. A man who dreams that he is cutting his hair, this is evidence of his poverty after his wealth, and this is due to excessive generosity, as he will suffer from many diseases and hardships. A man sees that his hair has become very black but curly, and this is evidence that he will deceive the world by talking, especially women. Seeing a man as if his hair is golden, this indicates that he is a loyal person who loves him and will be a very loyal friend to the woman he loves. For a man to see the woman he loves reddish means that he will be exposed to a brief description of the woman he loves and will provide himself for her, which leads to betrayal, because seeing red hair in general is evidence of changes in life. The visionary. Seeing a man with soft hair growing on his head indicates that the circumstances will change for this visionary and he will live a more luxurious and happy life. Seeing a woman’s hair in a man’s dream is a sign of intense love for a woman, as he will be loyal to her and attached to her. Seeing a man as if his hair is dyed with flowers, this indicates the coming of many problems and troubles and the person who feels very afraid of them. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss Some scholars have cited the interpretation of the dream of seeing heavy hair loss as an indication

title: Interpretation of dreams about a plane that crashed in front of me and did not explode for all scientists

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a plane crash. Many people always wonder to know the interpretation of dreams about a plane crash in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi and Ibn Shaheen. It is one of the widespread visions in the dreams of many people. But the plane crashing and burning in a dream is not one of the widespread visions, so anyone who sees this dream is confused in Its interpretation, and many interpreters have interpreted this dream in many interpretations and connotations. The plane crash and burning. Interpretation of the dream for a single woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about a plane crash. Ibn Sirin explained the plane crash with many interpretations, as the plane crash is one of the things that cannot be achieved. When a person sees in Dreaming that planes are exploding, then he should know that he must repeat his plans and review all his steps and plans for his future projects to avoid failure. When someone sees in a dream that he is on a plane and someone is trying to keep him away and there is an argument with him, this symbolizes that good and evil in his life are in conflict. He also wishes to achieve his dreams and ambitions despite the difficulties he faces. When a person sees in his dream that a plane is falling before his eyes and that it has completely crashed, then he should know that he must change all his plans in life. If a person sees in his dream that he was in a plane and fell, then this dream A warning to him because he is making wrong decisions in his life. If one dreams of a plane exploding in front of his eyes, this means that it is important for him to review the steps he takes so that he does not suffer a serious failure. When one dreams that a plane is crashing and he is alive, this means that there is A big problem will hinder him and disturb him, but he will come out of this problem stronger than he was at the beginning. Interpretation of seeing a plane crash in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi After we discovered the dream interpretation of a plane crash in Ibn Sirin’s dream, we must know the interpretation of this dream also according to Al-Nabulsi. If the owner of this vision had a loved one travel He sees that the plane crashed in a dream, which indicates that this traveler will be exposed to some crises in his travels. Al-Nabulsi also believes that the plane crash is one of the visions that is not good, but only in one case, which is that the person who had the vision survived this accident that caused this plane to crash. The plane crashed in a dream. Fahd Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of dreams about a plane crash. Al-Osaimi believes that planes are mainly related to current events in life. And if you dream of a plane, all you have to do is check the condition of that plane, and whether that plane was taking off or landing and had a bad landing or was hijacked. Also, falling from the plane indicates that you are desperate to end a certain situation in your life. Also, in some cases, jumping from the plane means that you cannot wait for the change you want to happen in your life. Many people also said that they found themselves falling from the sky while in On the plane that landed, and this indicates that something bad happened recently in their lives and then they landed on something good. Al-Taqinat Interpretation of dreams about a plane crash In a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi, and Ibn Shaheen via a different website. The bird crashed

title: Interpretation of magic in a dream - seeing magic in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of magic dreams for a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, married or single young man, whether the magic is broken. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream Seeing magic in general has an evil connotation, it may indicate a psychological or organic illness or spiritual poverty, and decoding magic with magic and satanic spells does not indicate good or healing and removing evil, but rather indicates that the fortuneteller has some corrupt positions and values, and the indications of magic are the same as the indications of breaking it in a dream, and healing from magic automatically indicates God's mercy and the repentance of the dreamer. If you dream that you are under the influence of magic, this indicates that if you are not careful, you will be exposed to some evil in the form of pleasure. Young people should pay attention to the good advice of those older than them. If you resist magic, this portends that you will be very desirable because of your wise advice and breadth of thinking. If you dream that you are trying to bewitch others, this portends that you will fall into distress. If you dream that you are carrying out any plan with magic, this indicates pleasant surprises. Seeing others performing magic means profitable changes for everyone who dreams of this dream. Seeing a magician in a dream means a very pleasant journey for those interested in advancing to a higher culture and profitable performance for the greedy. Here magic should not be confused with magical and astrological activities. If the reader interprets this way, he may expect the opposite of what is stated here. True magic is the study of the higher truths of nature. If you dream that you are in hypocrisy or under the power of another, this portends bad results, because your enemy will bewitch you. But if you bring others under your spell, you will prove that you have a firm willpower to control your environment. If a girl dreams that she is under the influence of a stranger, this means that she will be in danger and should be careful. If a girl dreams that she is under the influence of a stranger, this means that she will be in danger and should be careful. If you dream that you see hypnosis and planning, this indicates tension and complications in work and family circles and indicates unhealthy conditions in the state. The place of magic in a dream is disease, evil, poverty, evil, corruption, malice, ignorance and all kinds of creation that indicate immorality and disobedience, a useless demagogic mind and a weak heart of faith. The place of magic may be the same as the place of gambling and other reprehensible places. Whoever sees in his dream that he is resisting magic, this indicates that the dreamer is wise and his advice can be taken, and he is wise and healthy, and good changes for the dreamer. Magic in a dream can be a sign of an enjoyable trip for people interested in progress and civilization. The magician in a dream refers to a liar, evil and hypocrite, and in some visions the magician in a dream refers to the devil or gossip or the sheikh who claims knowledge and religion, the person who has influence on the masses, the misleading liar who is only interested in collecting money. Seeing buried magic in a dream indicates deception, lies and deception of the fortune teller, and seeing buried magic in a dream indicates treasures of forbidden money and books of anger and superstitions, and it is said that magic in a dream indicates evil. Blind

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a whale in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about seeing a whale in a dream, the whale is a marine mammal, because it is considered one of the largest and famous marine creatures that live in the seas and oceans and is characterized by a huge and long body, but what is the meaning of the interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream according to the pioneering Arab translators and scholars in Interpretation of dreams and visions. Interpretation of a dream about a whale by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained that he sees a whale in a dream, as it indicates a place of worship for the righteous. A whale in a dream also symbolizes fears and sorrows, and indicates problems in the field of work. Also, seeing a whale in water indicates Loss of the dreamer's status. In general, seeing a whale in a dream is evidence of a major event that will happen after a while. Dreaming about catching a whale indicates exploitation and harm that the fortuneteller will suffer. A mother who sees her whale in a whale is an indication of a strong sense of motherhood and a desire to protect her children. Seeing a dreamer chasing a whale in a dream and seeing it throughout the swimming period is a sign of comfort. Interpretation of seeing a whale by Ibn Shaheen: Interpretation of a dream of seeing a whale in a dream. Surrounding a person from all directions in a dream is evidence that he is exposed to a difficult matter that the dreamer will suffer from and that will carry a serious burden in the coming days. Dreaming of a large number of whales in a dream is a sign of worry about many matters, constant thinking, and constant unhappiness. Seeing a person in the belly of a whale Lions in a dream are evidence of God’s satisfaction with that person and acceptance of his prayers and supplication to the Lord. Interpretation of a dream about whale bites in a dream proves that the dreamer was injured due to his passivity in dealing with various issues in his life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a whale from Al-Nabulsi: And Al-Nabulsi’s explanation of seeing a whale, where He said: If the dreamer sleeps on his right side and sees a whale, then the dream indicates that the dreamer is righteous. Seeing the death of a whale in a dream is evidence that there is happy news that the dreamer will hear soon. He also said that seeing a whale in a dream indicates anxiety, sadness, and the disappearance of attitudes and anger. Seeing The whale of the Prophet Yunus, peace be upon him, in a dream. This means safety for the fearful, rich for the poor, and relief from sadness. Feeling intense fear and running away from a whale in a dream is a sign that the person will not be able to deal with the crises and difficulties he faces in all aspects of his life. Interpretation of a dream about a whale for a pregnant woman: Pisces in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman is evidence of the severe stress that has been with her since her birth. A pregnant woman seeing a whale in a dream is an indication of an easy birth and good health for the child. Also, a whale in a pregnant woman’s dream in general is evidence of the arrival of good and abundant livelihood for her. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: Married woman Whoever sees a whale in a dream means that she will soon give birth to a healthy child. Also, the interpretation of seeing a whale for a married woman means saving her from many problems and troubles and getting rid of them. The interpretation of seeing a whale in the sea in general in a married woman’s dream is only evidence of stability in her life and in Her home. Also, a married Pisces in a dream indicates that her children will be better

title: Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, and the interpretation of seeing a domestic lion in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: The most important interpretations of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Of course, predatory animals can terrify many people in life, but seeing these animals, such as a lion, does not necessarily mean danger or fear when you see them in a dream, as they can indicate the presence of goodness. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman? Seeing it in a sick state and without fear or fear is a strong indication that he will recover from all the diseases that the dreamer suffers from in the near future and the disease will not return to his body again. Its appearance shows many times that a person suffers from problems in his life and can find appropriate solutions to all these problems and get rid of them easily without affecting his personal life. If a person eats its meat in a dream, this is a strong indication that he will undermine all his enemies in the society in which he lives and overcome them and get a lot of money as a gift to him. In the event that a person is unable to marry even if this animal appears to him in his dream, this is one of the indications that he will get a loyal wife and a correct marriage that will make him happy in his next life and bring him joy. And joy. It may indicate the cruelty that the husband suffers from and the fear of his persecution or the injustice that he may inflict on others in the society in which he lives. The appearance of this animal may indicate the long life he lives, his enjoyment of health and well-being, and his prestigious position in society among people. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin? The interpreter Ibn Sirin explained the cases in which a lion can appear in a dream and the interpretation of each of them, and we can mention in the following points: Its appearance in a dream indicates that there are many people conspiring against her and trying to harm her, and that she will not be able to overcome them in the near future, and she must seek refuge in the Book of God (Glory be to Him) and you maintain the ruqyah and the Qur’an. The state of not being afraid or feeling terrified of the lion when seeing it shows that there are many problems that cause crises in life and whoever sees it will be able to overcome all these problems forever and find the appropriate solution to them. In some cases, it indicates obtaining a large livelihood and a lot of lawful money during the close periods of her life and the ability to use it to change her life for the better and achieve happiness and enjoyment for everyone. The days of his life. The most important interpretations of seeing a lion in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a tame lion in a dream for a married woman? The appearance of a peaceful lion in a person's house is a sign that he will receive a lot of good in the coming days and that this good will be enjoyed by all family members residing in the house. It can indicate the end of all kinds of problems that may exist between the person and his family and the resolution of controversial issues and the return of life between them to normal, calm and peaceful conditions. Seeing him in this state and not being afraid is evidence that the dreamer has suffered from major crises in his life or that he has many debts and that he will be able to spend all these debts and solve all the crises he faced in his life. ZOE. Indicates

The appearance of a peaceful lion in a person’s home is a sign that he will receive a lot of goodness in the coming days and that this goodness will be enjoyed by all family members residing in the house. It can It indicates the end of all kinds of problems that may exist between the person and his family, the resolution of controversial issues, and the return of life between them to normal, calm and peaceful conditions. Seeing him in this state and not being afraid is evidence that the dreamer has suffered from major crises in his life or that he has many debts and that he will be able To spend all these debts and solve all the crises he faced in his life.

title: Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing harassment indicates obtaining money from illegal and prohibited sources such as usury and consuming an orphan’s money. Seeing harassment in a dream can be evidence of immorality. Harassment can indicate an urgent desire for lusts, refuge in this world, and lack of thought about the afterlife. Seeing harassment is evidence of competition in the field of work and obtaining money and inheritance. Seeing harassment is also interpreted as indicating the reputation and honor of a good person. Harassment in a dream is bad for both the harasser and the harassed. Interpretation of seeing harassment for relatives: Whoever sees in a dream that he is harassing a woman among his relatives, whether she is His sister, aunt, or great-aunt, this indicates a serious illness. Harassing a relative in a dream also indicates losing a job or being exposed to a scandal. Harassing a girl by his relatives may be evidence of her marriage, but the relationship between them will end in sadness and grief. Harassing a girl by the fortuneteller’s relatives may indicate that she will be exposed to For financial loss, and it may be bad that she follows the path of deception and she must return to God and repent. A girl who sees in a dream that one of her relatives is harassing her, this is a warning sign of this person and she must stay away from him. Interpretation of seeing a man harassing a man Who dreams that he is harassing a beautiful girl in a dream, this indicates On the other hand, he commits a sin and falls into sacrilege. Harassment in a man’s dream indicates meeting a friend in a bad way. Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman sees someone harassing her in a dream, this indicates that she is falling in illicit love and it may be a warning sign of Falling into indecency and committing adultery. Harassing an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she is going through many accusations and suspicions in her life. Seeing harassment in a married woman’s dream. A married woman who sees harassment in a dream indicates that she will be deceived and deceived by people close to her. If she sees a man harassing her in a dream This means that you are entering into an illicit relationship with a person of bad reputation and morals. Whoever sees that her husband is abusing her in a dream shows love and affection between them. Interpretation of seeing harassment in a pregnant woman’s dream. A pregnant woman who sees harassment in a dream indicates that she will face many problems that will harm her. With her reputation. And whoever sees a handsome, strange man abusing her, this indicates that God will bless her with a very handsome and good-looking child. As for whoever sees a man abusing her with an ugly face, this indicates that she will be exposed to problems and troubles during childbirth and after it. Interpretation of a dream about molesting a child in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: sexual harassment of children indicates However, the dreamer has bad character and does not fear God in all his dealings. But some explain that this person is so evil that he thinks about the children of innocent creatures and tries to harm them. Which indicates that he has no feelings, he allows all forbidden things while they do it, and he is not afraid of committing sins. And sins, but rather tries to approach mistakes. It can indicate the bad life that a person lives and affects his thinking and dreams in the most horrific way. Sexual harassment

title: Interpretation of a dream about growing up and listening to it in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the takbir and hearing it in a dream (in detail). It is one of the most important interpretations related to how close a person is to his Lord, as it is seen as evidence of the appearance of positive signs in the life of the person who dreams of this dream. You may also be interested in knowing the color green in a dream. It can be a sign A warning to someone who is approaching his Lord and may repent of what he does when he sees this dream. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of the takbir and hearing it in a dream (in detail) by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the takbir and hearing it in a dream (detail) has a relationship to the psychological state of a person and we explain it as follows: If the same person sees That he is in a mosque, and he rejoiced when he heard the call to prayer, then this is a great sign that this person is loved by God and close to him. Moreover, Ibn Sirin believes that hearing the takbir may be an indication that someone is very jealous of the person who sees the dream. It is possible Also, hearing the call to prayer is evidence of a person’s desire to repent and that he has a great conscience in his life. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream Takbir Interpretation and listening to singles The interpretation of Takbir and hearing it in a dream (detail) for an unmarried woman differs from the interpretation for a married woman, and we explain it as follows: If A single woman dreams that she is saying “Allahu Akbar” in a mosque, this is evidence that righteous people enter her life. An unmarried woman who sees that she is closing the windows so that she does not hear the “Allahu Akbar” is evidence of magic that was done to her by a relative of hers. The girl’s desire to hear the “Allahu Akbar” is a sign that she is a conservative girl who fears angering her Lord. And fear The girl hears the sound of the takbeer and the appearance of spasms in her body is evidence that she is listening to songs in a loud and unnatural voice. The girl also closes her ears tightly as a result of the takbeer, and this is evidence that there are many people who want to prevent her from getting close to her Lord. Her hearing the takbeer and being happy with it is a great indication of her intention to memorize. The entire Qur’an, and you will succeed in that, and God knows best. See also: Backgrounds in a dream The interpretation of hearing the takbir in a dream for a married woman Hearing the takbir in a married woman’s dream is a sign of her life with her husband, and we explain that in the topic of interpreting the takbir and hearing it in a dream (detail) and we explain it as follows: A dream A married woman hearing the takbir and being sad is evidence that she is a disobedient wife to her husband and that there are major problems with the husband, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman herself happy hearing the takbir is evidence that her husband loves her and cares about her God within her and respects and appreciates her. A married woman sitting in a mosque with a group of Women are evidence that she meets new people who will bring her closer to her Lord. If a woman sees herself reading the Qur’an while listening to the takbir, this indicates a good ending for her, and God knows best. A married woman’s escape from hearing the takbir is a sign of her husband’s distance from his Lord, and that he is trying to distract her from her faith. By her Lord. A married woman’s feeling of fear upon hearing the takbir is great evidence that her life is exposed to great envy. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of hearing the takbir for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of hearing the takbir and hearing it in a dream varies (with details)

title: Interpretation of fighting in a dream – a vision of conflict, fighting in a dream

preview.html: The dream of fighting, fighting and struggling for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, to fight with a giant, seeing two men fighting and wrestling according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen and others. Wrestling in a dream is one of the very frightening dreams that We see it constantly in our dreams because of the problems and conflicts we face in our daily lives, and many young people also notice that they see wrestling in a dream, due to its frequent repetition. Constantly watching the creation of freestyle wrestling events, which have managed to enter the world into the hearts of many fans around the world, and wrestling is an important and popular sport for many people around the world. We will examine for you the interpretation of seeing wrestling in a dream, as the great commentator Ibn Sirin explained to us, which he explained to us in all detail. The different shapes that we see in a dream carry many important clues for us to know. Interpretation of wrestling in a dream: As for wrestling: if the races are different, then the wrestler is victorious, such as blood, animals, jinn, and the like, and if the wrestling is between two men, then the wrestler is defeated. And if he sees that he has in his hand what he can push from the engine, and in his opponent’s hand is less than that, then it will be completed. Praise for him. Wrestling in a dream is strife, and death is better than a wrestler. Whoever sees in a dream that he is wrestling with a man and is defeated, he will be victorious in reality. Interpretation of wrestling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a dispute with the king as evidence of humiliation and worry after money and glory. And if he is sick and sees that he is crying, he will die. Whoever sees in a dream that he is fighting a huge lion and defeats him, he will defeat a great king. If you dream of seeing a struggle with someone, this means that you will face serious problems, but if you win your battle, you will overcome the difficulties that stand On your way forward. Whoever sees a person in a dream that he suffers from epilepsy, his wealth will perish, and whoever is defeated in wrestling will be victorious while awake. If two angels fight with the intention of war, the defeated is the victor. Whoever sees that two men are fighting, and one of them kills his partner, then the death of both of them is better. Wrestling is a struggle. If a woman sees that the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, fought her and threw her and sat on her chest, her husband will die and she will marry another man. Confusion is a sign of epilepsy and may indicate that the patient is healthy rather than ill. Whoever sees in a dream that the jinn has overthrown him, then he will consume usury, or perform magic, or his money will go away while he is worried. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s dream of wrestling. The scholar Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing wrestling in a dream as a dispute, and if the wrestling was between two men, this indicates defeat. Wrestler, if the wrestling is between heterosexuals. And the blood of a human being and seven people, then a wrestler is better than the dead. Interpretation of wrestling in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. As for the scholar Ibn Shaheen, he interpreted the vision of wrestling in a dream and said: If the races differ, such as humans, animals, or jinn, then the wrestler is in control, and if the wrestling is between two men, then the wrestler. He is the one who defeats another with a tool or any tool with which he can defend himself, so the vision

If you dream of seeing a struggle with someone, this means that you will face serious problems, but if you win your battle, you will overcome the difficulties that stand On your way forward. Whoever sees a person in a dream that he suffers from epilepsy, his wealth will perish, and whoever is defeated in wrestling will be victorious while awake. If two angels fight with the intention of war, the defeated is the victor. Whoever sees that two men are fighting, and one of them kills his partner, then the death of both of them is better. Wrestling is a struggle. If a woman sees that the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, fought her and threw her and sat on her chest, her husband will die and she will marry another man. Confusion is a sign of epilepsy and may indicate that the patient is healthy rather than ill. Whoever sees in a dream that the jinn has overthrown him, then he will consume usury, or perform magic, or his money will go away while he is worried. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s dream of wrestling. The scholar Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing wrestling in a dream as a dispute, and if the wrestling was between two men, this indicates defeat. Wrestler, if the wrestling is between heterosexuals. And the blood of a human being and seven people, then a wrestler is better than the dead. Interpretation of wrestling in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. As for the scholar Ibn Shaheen, he interpreted the vision of wrestling in a dream and said: If the races differ, such as humans, animals, or jinn, then the wrestler is in control, and if the wrestling is between two men, then the wrestler.
